title: Goldspur
text:
Goldspur or Golden Spur is a <a href="Golden%20Delicious">Golden Delicious</a>-like <a href="apple">apple</a> <a href="cultivar">cultivar</a> which is spur bearing. It is a very compact tree, dwarf and column growing.
It is compatible for cross pollination with: '<a href="Dorsett%20Golden">Dorsett Golden</a>', '<a href="Ein%20Shemer">Ein Shemer</a>', '<a href="Gala%20%28apple%29">Gala</a>', '<a href="Liberty%20%28apple%29">Liberty</a>', 'Prime Gold' and '<a href="Spartan%20%28apple%29">Spartan</a>'. Needs lot of maintenance, but is highly rewarding.
